definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><value name="a"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:ObombaBlock</field></block></value><value name="b"><block type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="math_from_text"><value name="NUMTEXT"><block type="gui_get_text_textfield"><field name="textfield">CoordX</field></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_from_text"><value name="NUMTEXT"><block type="gui_get_text_textfield"><field name="textfield">CoordY</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="math_from_text"><value name="NUMTEXT"><block type="gui_get_text_textfield"><field name="textfield">CoordZ</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="explode"><value name="x"><block type="math_from_text"><value name="NUMTEXT"><block type="gui_get_text_textfield"><field name="textfield">CoordX</field></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_from_text"><value name="NUMTEXT"><block type="gui_get_text_textfield"><field name="textfield">CoordY</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="math_from_text"><value name="NUMTEXT"><block type="gui_get_text_textfield"><field name="textfield">CoordZ</field></block></value></block></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">20</field></block></value><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Obomba detonated. Thanks, Obama.</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Incorrect coordinates for Obomba. Please try again.</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
